Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 13:43:27
Folder: CWJ6WVW - policy document - allied enterprises 2024-2025
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: CWJ6WVW_01
From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
To: Savio Salvador D'costa <Savio.Dcosta@nascodubai.com>
CC: Jagdish Laxman Nettimi <Jagdish.Laxman@nascodubai.com>; Diana Haydar <Diana.Haydar@nascodubai.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-01-13 14:38
Subject: RE:  Policy Document - Allied Enterprises 2024-2025
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Savio,

Thank you for your below e-mail. Please note that the agreed changes below are not reflected in the issued policy.

Kindly request GIG to incorporate the below as agreed:

QUOTE

1.	Deductibles:

	*	Natural Perils: The deductible of USD 10,000 is acceptable. However:

		*	Storm: Should be defined as a period of violent weather characterized by high winds (exceeding 80 km/h) and accompanied by heavy rainfall, hail, lightning, or snow, causing significant damage to property. [GIG]: agreed

	*	Water Damage Losses: 10% of the claim with a minimum of USD 2,000  [GIG]: Agreed
	*	BI – First 3 days each and every loss. – OK

2.	Warranties and Conditions – Amendments Required:

*	Storm: Should be defined as a period of violent weather characterized by high winds (exceeding 80 km/h) and accompanied by heavy rainfall, hail, lightning, or snow, causing significant damage to property. [GIG]: agreed

	*	Water Damage Losses: 10% of the claim with a minimum of USD 2,000  [GIG]: Agreed
	*	BI – First 3 days each and every loss. – OK

2.	Warranties and Conditions – Amendments Required:

	*	All trade refuse be swept up daily, placed in bags and removed from the premises at least once a week; or as reasonably required in the context of the operation of the insured; [GIG]: Agreed
	*	Empty cardboard boxes which are of no further use and all waste materials must be removed from the premises and not allowed to accumulate or as reasonably required in the context of the operation of the insured; [GIG]: Agreed

*	All trade refuse be swept up daily, placed in bags and removed from the premises at least once a week; or as reasonably required in the context of the operation of the insured; [GIG]: Agreed
	*	Empty cardboard boxes which are of no further use and all waste materials must be removed from the premises and not allowed to accumulate or as reasonably required in the context of the operation of the insured; [GIG]: Agreed

Hazardous Goods Warranty: Hazardous Goods Warranty : Warranted that unless specifically mentioned in the Schedule no hazardous goods as defined below shall be kept stored or used in or upon the premises described in this Policy, other than quantities for private use or retail purposes not exceeding in all 3% of the Sum Insured on contents, or in the case of goods in Section A not more than 30 litres in all  (except as required in the Insured’s normal course of business) Section A:, Fumigants, , Spirits and other inflammable liquids, flashing below 65 degrees Centigrade. Section B: Ammunition, Blacks of all kinds, Bitumen Tar and Pitch, Calcium Carbide, Celluloid (other than manufactured articles), Chlorates, Explosives, Fireworks, Gas in Cylinders, Magnesium, Matches, Naphtha and its derivatives, Nitrates and Nitrides, Potassium and its compounds, compounds, Resins, Rubber solution and Contact Adhesives, Sulphur and Sulphides

 

Note: We have perfumes which fall under inflammable liquids and is significantly more than 3% of the sum insured. This warranty needs to be amended.

 

[GIG]: Agreed to amend as mentioned in blue above

UNQUOTE

Note: We have perfumes which fall under inflammable liquids and is significantly more than 3% of the sum insured. This warranty needs to be amended.

 

[GIG]: Agreed to amend as mentioned in blue above

UNQUOTE

Appreciate your kind support.

Best Regards,

Hagop

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 8045000
